column5: Well started off with going to Port Albert. Arrived there at 8:30am, and fished there for 3 hours! Not a single hit, and didn't even see one fish jump! So I decided to head down to the salt mines in Goderich and hit the Maitland. Glad I did, because I landed my first Steelie ever. Weighed in at 8 lbs and caught it on pink roe!
Way to go.  Where's the pics?
Congrats on the first.  LOL...yeah...wheres the pics?
How is the run up there, is it worth a trip this weekend. I'm sure the water must be pretty low and clear.    Clarence
Hey man good job, feels great getting that monkey off yur back eh! Ya gotta get a camera and take some quik shots of yur day.

the pic is on my cell phone. Joonmoon I will show you the pic on Friday at work. I do not have a cable to upload picture's to my computer. Sorry guys, thought i would share the story for the people that are planing going for the steelie's. The water was fairly high and not as merky as Port Albert. Once again guys sorry for no pic, but I will show Joonmoon at work and he can vouch for me! I Don't LIE!!!!! lol.
I have a camera...you should take me with you....next time...lol. Thanks fur sharing yur story.
Sweet!  I was wondering about the Maitland...a friend of mine just moved out there and has property backing right onto it.  A friend in need of a visit, methinks...
Congratulation on your first ever dizzidevil Thanks for sharing your accomplishment Leechman
Good to hear you popped your cherry..... Don't ever post another steelhead report without pictures , LOL !!!!
